entry.title: Welcome
entry.content:
Welcome to EE214 Autumn 2022 Course.

  • Please watch the video resources posted on Week-0 lab materials.
  • For more details on language contruct of VHDL, please go through "VHDL tutorial by Peter J Ashenden" (see Week 1 lab materials)
  • Install Quartus, installation instructions are present under the heading "Software Installation" on this website.
  • To report any issues with the website, drop a mail to akhileshrao@ee.iitb.ac.in

Link to Week 0 materials
